about_the_game: Free Admission to Mondrian - Plastic Reality is here! This official demo includes the Endless Quick Play mode, Piet and Sophie as playable characters, ten levels, half the game's soundtrack, a small handful of background art, Mondrian Maker (with no Open window), Mondrian Studio (with image watermarks), and even Steam Workshop access! Upgrade to the full game to get 90+ more levels, more game modes (including Adventure Mode with a customizable art museum), the ability to open levels in Mondrian Maker, no watermarks in Mondrian Studio, Leaderboards, more playable characters, more music, more background art, and a whole creative community's-worth of Steam Workshop content.
detailed_description:
#MakeAMondrian

The Mondrian - Plastic Reality demo includes Workshop compatibility for Mondrian Maker levels! Download the demo, make a level and click the Share button to upload it direct to the Workshop.

This Workshop only applies to the current demo and the content on it won't carry over to the launch game. Please save your work on your own computer! When the game launches in September, you'll be able to reupload it if you buy the game.

short_description: Mondrian's back & he's taking his friends for a time-tripping, brickbreaking spin through the Plastic Reality. Break the blocks to uncover the secrets of Modernism's lost masterpieces & share your own Creations with the world via the Mondrian Maker level editor. The canvas is waiting.
